mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rnum, c.* from (select d.* from (select spickno, b.sfno sfno, id, spickdate, spickyn, sfnm, dongcate from sportList a join sportPick b on a.sfno = b.sfno)d order by spickno) c) where rnum between #{startRow} and #{endRow}

select * from (select rownum rnum, c.* from (select d.* from (select scurrno, b.sfno sfno, id, sfnm, dongcate, scurrdate from sportList a join sportCurr b on a.sfno = b.sfno) d order by scurrdate desc) c) where rnum between 1 and 10

select * from (select rownum rnum, c.* from (select d.* from (select sreno, b.sfno sfno, id, sfnm, dongcate, sredate from sportList a join sportreview b on a.sfno = b.sfno)d order by sreno) c) where rnum between #{startRow} and #{endRow}
